description: Shopee Open Platform is a go-to source of Open APIs and services for developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs
notes:
This appears to be the introduction/overview page of Shopee Open Platform documentation. Key information extracted:

1. Language Support: English, 简体中文, 繁體中文, Português, ไทย

2. Main Features:
- Powerful APIs for orders, products, marketing
- Push notification services
- Developer services including onboarding, testing, and maintenance
- API testing tools and sandbox environments

3. Target Users:
- Software service providers
- Sellers with software development capabilities

No specific API endpoints or parameters are shown on this page as it's an overview/introduction section.

main_features: Get important information (Announcement, Documentation, Support Center)
sections.benefits: Quick and easy access to shop data for selling on Shopee, including product, order, and campaign management across all markets

access_types.description: Comprehensive range of Open APIs for software businesses
Integration capabilities for operations optimization and data management
